features.name: QR Code Generator
features.description: Users enter payment details (IBAN, amount, symbols) and generate a scannable QR code in BySquare or EPC format.

features.name: QR Code Branding
features.description: Customize QR code colors, add center text overlay, upload a logo, and save/load branding templates.

features.name: Payment History
features.description: Auto-saves generated payments locally (max 50). Supports naming, pinning, restoring, and deleting entries.

features.name: Share Payment Link
features.description: Generate a shareable URL with encoded payment details. Recipients see the QR code and can copy the IBAN.

features.name: Bulk QR Generation
features.description: Upload a CSV file to generate multiple QR codes at once. Export as ZIP, PDF, or print directly.

features.name: Format Selection
features.description: Switch between BySquare (Slovak standard with VS/SS/KS) and EPC QR (European SEPA with BIC).

features.name: QR Download & Copy
features.description: Download QR code as PNG, copy to clipboard, or share via system share menu.

features.name: Bulk ZIP Export
features.description: Download all generated QR codes as PNG files in a ZIP archive using a zero-dependency STORE implementation.

features.name: Bulk PDF Export
features.description: Generate a printable A4 PDF with QR codes laid out in a 2x3 grid per page using jsPDF.

features.name: Bulk Print
features.description: Print QR codes directly from the browser with an optimized 3-column grid layout.

features.name: FAQ
features.description: Accordion-style FAQ page with JSON-LD structured data for SEO.

features.name: Feature Requests
features.description: Dialog for users to submit improvement suggestions with rate limiting and submission history.

features.name: Multi-Language Support
features.description: Full localization in Slovak, Czech, and English with locale-prefixed routes and language switcher.

features.name: Theme Switching
features.description: Toggle between light and dark mode with OS preference detection and persistence.

features.name: Consent Banner
features.description: One-time banner informing users about localStorage usage. No cookies, no data collection.

features.name: Offline Support
features.description: Service worker enables partial offline functionality. QR generation works without internet.

features.name: Privacy Policy
features.description: Data protection information page explaining that all data stays in the browser.

features.name: Terms of Service
features.description: Usage terms and conditions for the service.
